name: Neon-RunGun
description:
This is a pixel-art platformer, endless runner with shooting element that will challenge you with 2 gameplay modes, Speed mode and Boss mode.

In the Speed mode your objective is to survive as long as you can running and jumping from one platform to another while the speed constantly increases and enemies try to block you.

In the Boss mode you are challenged to defeat a number of bosses that will try to stop you one after the other.

______________________________________________

Game by SilentOak

Music by Defrini
